title: Retro Toons SFX Pack
description: 153 files include wacky sounds, funny whistles, horns sounds, cartoony transition sounds, and so on! You can capture the atmosphere of Cuphead and can make games and videos like this.
longDescription:
Retro Toons brings the tone of the cartoon-like sound effects to you.


140 files include wacky sounds, funny whistles, horns sounds, cartoony transition sounds, and so on! You can capture the atmosphere of vintage cartoons and can make games and videos like this.


You’ll have access to cartoon sound effects, birds sound effects, whistle sound effects, horns sound effects, and designed sound effects that you need for your projects.

The sounds are designed to have room for further sound design with the flexible texture for customization. Plus, you get the usual Vadi Sound craft and attention to detail!


Go ahead and create that great cartoony atmosphere that you need!


Keywords including Actions, Parts, Equipment and Style


Toy animation cartoon toon retro bird blip glide magic melody movement jump whoop water bubble animal designed elephant billiards boing clang crystal melodic drop coin fan funny duck glide machine loop whistle horn harmonica impact question answer pop run shake step swish tiny voice speedy weird wobble zip music digital mechanical game instrument child toy-box toy
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 140

Sample rate / bit rate: 16 Bit/ 48 Khz

Do Sound FX loop: No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
